job_title: Process Expert (f/m/d) Lead to Cash for Service & Governance Units (Betriebswirt/in (Hochschule))
full_description: Transform the everyday. Join our team as a Lead to Cash Process Expert (f/m/d) and play a key role in driving automation, digitalization, and harmonization across Siemens' finance and controlling processes. As part of our team, you will have: - An attractive remuneration package- Appealing Siemens pension benefits and access to employee share plans- 30 days of paid vacation and a variety of flexible work schedules that allow time off for you and your family- 2 to 3 days of mobile working per week as a global standard Since each of over 300,000 employees feels that other benefits are particularly important, and we cannot list our entire benefit portfolio here, you can find more information here ( https://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs/benefits-what-we-offer.html ) . The individual benefits are subject to regulatory, contractual, or corporate conditions. This will be your impact: - Process Design and Automation: As a process expert for the Lead-to-Cash process across SFS, SRE, and Service & Governance, you’ll analyze global and regional needs and ensure systems are aligned using harmonized templates for financial processes.- Business Requirements Evaluation: You’ll review business needs for order management, including customer communication, and design clear, efficient processes that meet both business and technical goals.- System Harmonization: You’ll align systems and templates with financial reporting rules and legal standards to ensure consistency and compliance.- Cross-Project Management: You’ll manage tasks that span multiple projects, including adapting guidelines and documenting changes to accounting instructions (AIFG).- Implementation and Development: You’ll lead process improvements from concept to go-live, creating solutions that work for both business and IT teams. You’ll also present current and future designs in your governance role.- Communication & Collaboration:- With Siemens corporate units (SFS, SRE, and Service & Governance) to align on future Lead-to-Cash process needs.- With Sherpa X project teams to ensure integrated and consistent solutions.- With contributors across the Sherpa X program.- With Siemens IT teams to support standard system delivery. This is how you'll win us over: - Education: Master’s degree in business studies or economics or alternatively comparable qualification has been reached- Experience & Skills:- Several years of professional experience, preferably in the field of finance related solutions, as well as experience with SAP S4- Expertise in Lead-to-Cash processes- Good understanding of SAP S/4HANA and other Finance related solutions in general- You have 3-5 years of hands on experience and expertise in SAP SD- Expertise in other technical components relevant for the Lead-to-Cash Process within Sherpa X (SAP BTP, SAP DRC, EDI) is a plus- Knowledge of agile project methodology, experience in a global environment, operational business experience as well as intercultural experience is key- Affinity for IT and are willing to familiarize yourself with IT structures is helpful - Ways of working: Experience in working within virtual and global teams and you are a standout colleague with excellent communication and interpersonal skills- Languages: Business proficiency in English You are much more than your qualifications, and we believe in the potential of every single candidate. We look forward to getting to know you!     Your individual personality and perspective are important to us. We create a working environment that reflects the diversity of the society and support you in your personal and professional development. Let’s get to know your authentic personality and create a better future together with us. As an equal-opportunity employer we are happy to consider applications from individuals with disabilities ( https://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs/life-at-siemens/inclusion.html ) . Protecting the environment, conserving our natural resources, fostering the health and performance of our people as well as safeguarding their working conditions are core to our social and business commitment at Siemens. About us. Our global, diverse team is ready to support, challenge, and inspire you, helping you grow in countless ways. Together, we’ll embark on an exciting journey of discovery. Who knows where this path will lead? Join us and take an active role in shaping your future! www.siemens.com/careers ( http://www.siemens.com/careers )  – if you would like to find out more about jobs & careers at Siemens. FAQ ( https://www.siemens.com/global/en/company/jobs/faq.html )  – if you need further information on the application process.

Prioritize and process customer requests, supply issues, and complaints, in close cooperation with other departments Ihr Profil: - Minimum 3+ years of experience in intralogistics (goods receiving, warehousing, shipping) with at least two years leadership experience desired - Experience in aviation logistics is an advantage - High school or Professional School certificate - Good written and spoken Portuguese and English skills - Good computer skills (MS-Office), SAP is an advantage - Willingness to work shifts, holidays, and/or weekends as necessary - IATA regulations training, dangerous goods courses, Export Control courses are an advantage - Lean Basics or Intensive Training is an advantage Please send your application in English. full_description: Travel to sunny Lisbon and work with the world's most famous brands! How would you feel if your office was just a breath away from beaches with crystal-clear waters? Does 300 days of sunshine – along with flavorful Portuguese cuisine – sound like an option you’d like to explore? Lisbon is a vibrant and charismatic city, and one of the finest capital cities in Europe. The city boasts a glorious climate, lively nightlife, historic monuments, and a range of activities that will entertain visitors of all ages and dispositions. There is a lot to see and do - come and join our ever-growing Customer Care team in Lisbon! Our client Our client is a global leader in outsourcing, providing customer acquisition management, customer care, technical support, debt collection, and social media services. They operate in 88 countries, serving 170 markets, and have 420.000 employees worldwide. You will be part of an extremely driven team in awesome Portugal! Our client is awarded as Best Workplace in Portugal and as the Best Multilingual Omnichannel Contact Center in Europe! They offer complete training by certified instructors as well as many career development opportunities, so this is a unique chance to advance your career! Job description You are going to work as a content reviewer for one of the leading social media platforms. Your daily task will be filtering out inadequate content that goes against the platform's community rules. No previous experience is required, and you will receive a paid education. Requirements Being fluent (C2 level) in the Norwegian language Knowledge of the English language (minimum A2 level) Computer skills (basic skills mandatory, advanced skills like coding preferential) Excellent communication skills: verbal, written, and listening skills EU citizenship or work permit for Portugal What you are offered Complete relocation package that includes: refunded airline ticket + free accommodation in their company apartment throughout the employment Fixed monthly salary + bonus A contract focused on a long-term relationship Free Portuguese language lessons Private Health Insurance Professional growth & development opportunities Special HR team organizing events, sports tournaments, parties & trips Free support from the Employee Relations department during the hiring process, with regards to your Social Security number, Health Insurance (IKA), Tax Number, Bank account, etc Benefits of Portugal Living in Portugal offers many advantages: a warm climate, the Atlantic ocean, mountains nearby, a low crime rate, and a relatively low cost of living. Medicine and education are well developed here, and residents are offered tax exemptions.  As most Portuguese people speak English, one does not need to be fluent in Portuguese to live there. Employers must also pay employees a meal allowance for each workday. Our client pays it through a special card or ticket which makes the meal allowance tax-free.

Colaborar com a equipa na implementação de projetos socioculturais. Avaliar e registar resultados das atividades. Requisitos: Formação em Animação Sociocultural ou área relacionada. Criatividade, dinamismo e capacidade de comunicação. Espírito de equipa e empatia. Oferecemos integração numa equipa comprometida, oportunidades de desenvolvimento e remuneração conforme CCT

job_title: INSTRUTORES E MONITORES DE ATIVIDADE FÍSICA E RECREAÇÃO
full_description: Procuramos um(a) Instrutor Fitness dinâmico(a), motivado(a) e apaixonado(a) por transformar vidas através do exercício. Junta-te à nossa equipa com liberdade e impacto! O que procuramos? Certificação em Personal Training ou área equivalente; Experiência comprovada em treinos personalizados e acompanhamento de clientes; Domínio de plataformas digitais; Boa comunicação e capacidade de motivação; Paixão por promover um estilo de vida ativo e saudável; Flexibilidade para se adaptar às necessidades dos clientes. Responsabilidades: Avaliar as condições físicas e os objetivos dos clientes; Elaborar planos de treino personalizados e ajustados ao progresso de cada pessoa; Realizar sessões de treino individuais ou em grupo; Oferecer suporte motivacional e técnico aos clientes; Colaborar com outros profissionais da equipa para garantir um serviço integrado; Criar conteúdo motivacional e educativo para o site e redes sociais (opcional). O que oferecemos? Trabalho com flexibilidade horária; Remuneração competitiva baseada no número de clientes acompanhados; Oportunidade de crescimento profissional numa marca em expansão; Ambiente de trabalho colaborativo e motivador; Ferramentas digitais para facilitar o acompanhamento e comunicação.

job_title: INSTRUTORES E MONITORES DE ATIVIDADE FÍSICA E RECREAÇÃO
full_description: Promover o desenvolvimento sociocultural de grupos e comunidades, organizando, coordenando e/ou desenvolvendo atividades de animação (de caráter cultural, educativo, social, lúdico e recreativo). Organiza, coordena e ou desenvolve actividades de animação e desenvolvimento sócio-cultural junto dos utentes no âmbito dos objectivos da instituição; acompanha e procura desenvolver o espírito de pertença, cooperação e solidariedade das pessoas, bem como proporcionar o desenvolvimento das suas capacidades de expressão e realização, utilizando para tal métodos pedagógicos e de animação

job_title: INSTRUTORES E MONITORES DE ATIVIDADE FÍSICA E RECREAÇÃO
full_description: Profissional capaz de planear e desenvolver atividades de animação sociocultural e promover a implementação de programas recreativos numa comunidade de idosos.

job_title: INSTRUTORES E MONITORES DE ATIVIDADE FÍSICA E RECREAÇÃO
full_description: ANIMADOR SOCIOCULTURAL CONTEÚDO FUNCIONAL: INERENTES À FUNÇÃO, COM EXPERIÊNCIA MÍNIMA DE 1 ANO; CONHECIMENTOS DE INFORMÁTICA NA ÓTICA DO UTILIZADOR; CAPACIDADE DE PENSAMENTO CRÍTICO, CONCEPTUAL E ANALÍTICO; FACILIDADE EM ESTABELECER E MANTER UMA RELAÇÃO EMPÁTICA COM O UTENTE; CAPACIDADE DE ADAPTAÇÃO E ESPÍRITO DE EQUIPA; - 1 COLABORADOR A TEMPO INTEIRO - 1 COLABORADOR A PART-TIME ESCOLARIDADE MINIMA 12º ANO LOCAL DE TARBALHO: POVOA DE SANTA IRIA

job_title: Deutschsprachiger Kundensupportmitarbeiter (m/w/d) (German market fully remote within Portugal) (Callcenteragent/in)
full_description: ✨ Beschreibung Du interessierst dich für Kundenservice und moderne Technologien? Du möchtest in einer pulsierenden Stadt leben und internationale Berufserfahrung sammeln? Dann komm nach Lissabon! Die Hauptstadt des Surfens, der Sonne, der Kunst – und deines neuen Jobs! Werde Teil eines globalen Kundenserviceteams und unterstütze eines der renommiertesten Unternehmen der Welt. Deine Mission: Kundenanliegen professionell, empathisch und lösungsorientiert bearbeiten – und gleichzeitig für ein sicheres Online-Erlebnis sorgen. 🛠️ Deine Aufgaben - Professionelle Bearbeitung eingehender Anfragen via Telefon, Chat oder E-Mail - Prüfung und Moderation von Inhalten auf sozialen Netzwerken (Videos, Bilder, Audio) - Sicherstellung der Einhaltung von Community-Richtlinien - Identifikation und Entfernung nicht regelkonformer Inhalte - Strukturierung und Auswertung von Nutzerdaten zur Optimierung des Service - Dokumentation aller Kundenkontakte in der Servicedatenbank - Problemlösung durch gezielte Fragestellungen und Nutzung interner Wissensquellen - Empfehlung von Lösungen bei häufig auftretenden Problemen 🔎 Dein Profil - Deutsch auf muttersprachlichem Niveau (C1–C2) - Gute Englischkenntnisse (mindestens B2) - EU-Pass oder gültige Arbeitserlaubnis für Portugal - Bereitschaft zu Schichtarbeit - Erste Erfahrungen im Kundenservice von Vorteil - Ausgeprägte Kommunikationsfähigkeit & Empathie - Flexibilität und Teamgeist - Starkes Zeitmanagement 🎁 Wir bieten dir - Erstattung der Anreisekosten - Abholung vom Flughafen - Unterkunft in Unternehmenswohnungen (inkl. Nebenkosten) - Verpflegungszuschuss - Intensive Schulung & Coaching-Programme - Karrierechancen in einem internationalen Unternehmen - Stabile Anstellung mit Entwicklungsperspektiven - Private Krankenversicherung ab dem 1. Arbeitstag - Kostenloser Portugiesischunterricht, Sportangebote & Events 🚀 Starte dein Abenteuer in Portugal! Werde Teil eines motivierten Teams und wachse in einem dynamischen, internationalen Umfeld. Jetzt bewerben und durchstarten! Shirley.arlt@cbtalents.org

Rejoignez un groupe international et vivez une expérience internationale en Europe ! Vous aimez travailler dans un environnement international avec une culture entreprise dynamique ? BYSKILL recrute pour l'un de ses clients, leader mondial de la gestion de la relation client, des conseillers clientèle francophones H/F pour intégrer ses équipes à Braga (Portugal) En tant que conseiller(ère) clientèle francophone, vos missions se présentent comme suit : - Répondre aux demandes des clients et assurer un excellent service clientèle - Traiter les demandes, réclamations, commentaires - Assurer un service après-vente pour des demandes de support générales ou techniques via un ou plusieurs canaux de communication (Téléphone, email, chat, réseaux sociaux ) - Faire un reporting des interactions et transactions - Collaborer avec d'autres services pour résoudre et clôturer tout type de demande - Faire le suivi, respecter les procédures et assurer les échanges d'informations en interne Avantages du poste : - Un salaire attractif (versement supplémentaire d'un 13ème et d'un 14ème mois de salaire) - Prime de rendement en fonction du projet - Prime de transport - Prime repas (versée sur une carte que vous pouvez utiliser pour payer vos courses) - Formation complète sur le poste - Une assurance maladie et dentaire (gratuite après 6 mois d'ancienneté) - Possibilités de développement de carrière avec un programme spécifique - Possibilité de mobilité internationale sur l'un des sites de l'entreprise à travers le monde

job_title: Conseiller clientèle francophone - Domaine de la santé (H/F)
full_description: Rejoignez un groupe international et vivez une expérience internationale en Europe ! Vous aimez travailler dans un environnement international avec une culture entreprise dynamique ? BYSKILL recrute pour l'un de ses clients, leader mondial de la gestion de la relation client, des conseillers clientèle francophones - Domaine de la santé H/F pour intégrer ses équipes à Braga (Portugal) En tant que conseiller(ère) clientèle francophone, vous travaillez pour le service phare de prise de rendez-vous médicaux en ligne : - Conseiller les professionnels de santé et les accompagner par téléphone dans leur utilisation du logiciel, aussi bien en répondant à des demandes entrantes, qu'en les appelants de manière proactive - Former les professionnels de santé à l'utilisation des services par téléphone - Veiller au traitement rapide et efficace des demandes reçues par email - Travailler en étroite collaboration avec les équipes commerciales, Marketing, Produit pour assurer une parfaite satisfaction client Ce que nous recherchons : - Niveau élevé en Français (écrit et oral) - Excellentes compétences en rédaction et communication - Proactif(ve), axé(e) sur les résultats, motivé(e) et capable de travailler en équipe - Patient(e) et passionné(e) par le contact humain Avantages du poste : - Temps plein avec possibilité de CDI - Salaire local compétitif et prime de performance - Formation complète et rémunérée sur l'entreprise et le projet sur lequel vous allez travailler - Programmes de développement de carrière, cours spécialisés et cours de langue

Procuramos um(a) profissional com perfil comercial e comunicativo, capaz de representar a marca Smartify de forma dinâmica e criativa. O(a) candidato(a) deverá ter gosto pela área das vendas presenciais e online, sendo responsável por contactos com clientes em loja, por telefone, email e redes sociais, bem como pela realização de demonstrações e transmissões em direto (lives). Valorizam-se conhecimentos na área de marketing digital e criação de conteúdos, nomeadamente domínio das ferramentas Adobe Creative Cloud (Premiere, Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom, entre outras), bem como noções de edição de imagem e vídeo, e gestão de redes sociais. O perfil ideal combina competências comerciais, criatividade e orientação para resultados, com boa capacidade de comunicação, organização e espírito de equipa. É obrigatória a fluência em português (de Portugal), falado e escrito.

RECEÇÃO DE ENCOMENDAS COM CONFERÊNCIA DE PRAZOS DE VALIDADE, QUANTIDADE E PREÇO. INTERPRETAÇÃO DE PRESCRIÇÕES MÉDICAS COM AVIAMENTO E ESCLARECIMENTO AO UTENTE SOBRE POSOLOGIA, ETC. RECOLHA DE STOCK COM FIM DE VALIDADE PARA DEVOLUÇÃO AO FORNECEDOR. ORGANIZAÇÃO DE LINEARES CONSOANTE MUDANÇA SAZONAL.

O profissional requerido vai desempenhar funções como Repositor, nomeadamente: Dar entrada e saída de mercadorias no stock; Trocar mercadorias ou fazer o processo de devolução de produtos; Etiquetar e conferir a etiqueta dos produtos; Solicitar a compra de produtos necessários para manter o stock mínimo; Elaborar relatórios diversos; Fazer pesquisa de preços;  Colocar bens em caixas, em armários e empilhar mercadorias volumosas no chão; Encher prateleiras de produtos e assegurar que os produtos com menos validade estão à frente; Verificar a data de validade de produtos nas prateleiras; Remover bens fora de prazo das prateleiras

-Coordenar o trabalho da equipa de reposição e assegurar a reposição de produtos, caso necessário; Assegurar que o espaço já definido de cada marca se mantém fiel ao planograma; Negociar mais espaço extra e mais exposição do produto;  Assegurar que não existem ruturas de stock; Agilizar as devoluções e fazer sugestões de encomendas; Quando necessário, realizar a implementação de material PLV e POS, garantindo o correto visual de cada marca; Recolher informação de mercado sobre ações da concorrência; Efetuar relatórios diários.

A Confraria de Nossa Senhora da Franqueira pretende integrar um/a funcionário/a com competências nas áreas de apoio administrativo, secretariado e organização de arquivo, no âmbito dos trabalhos preparatórios do programa comemorativo: Franqueira  550 Anos de Devoção Mariana. O/A candidato/a irá prestar apoio técnico, metodológico e documental à organização, tratamento e catalogação do acervo histórico do Santuário, assegurando também tarefas de secretariado e suporte direto à Mesa da Confraria. As principais responsabilidades incluem o levantamento, inventariação e organização de arquivos físicos e digitais; catalogação de documentos segundo normas básicas de arquivo; digitalização de atas, registos, fotografias e materiais históricos; criação e manutenção de bases de dados documentais; preparação de dossiers temáticos; apoio na gestão administrativa corrente; tratamento de correspondência; organização de reuniões e produção de minutas. O perfil exige sentido de responsabilidade, organização, capacidade de trabalho autónomo, rigor no tratamento de informação e boa comunicação escrita. Valoriza-se formação ou experiência nas áreas de Administração, Secretariado, Arquivo, Património ou áreas afins, bem como domínio de ferramentas informáticas (Word, Excel, digitalização, gestão documental). Pretende-se uma pessoa motivada, com sensibilidade para o património cultural e religioso, e vontade de integrar um projeto de elevada relevância histórica e comunitária.

Workster is partnering with a global leader in customer experience and business process outsourcing to recruit Sales Representatives for an innovative cybersecurity client based in Lisbon. This is an exciting opportunity to join a high-energy, growth-focused sales team in the fast-paced world of digital security. Your Role Manage and expand an existing portfolio of customers, ensuring long-term relationships and customer satisfaction. Build strong client connections through outbound calls and video meetings. Accurately forecast sales opportunities and maintain up-to-date records in the CRM system Consistently meet or exceed sales targets and activity-based KPIs. Prepare quotes, process orders, and support customers with product inquiries. Collaborate with internal teams to ensure client success and continuous process improvements. Act as a trusted advisor, providing insights and guidance on cybersecurity solutions Your Qualifications Speak Danish fluently (C2 level) and have a good command of English (B2 level Proven experience in sales, business development, or account management, preferably in technology, SaaS, or B2B environments. Strong communication and negotiation skills, with a customer-centric approach. Ability to analyse sales data, forecast opportunities, and create action plans. Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment with ambitious growth targets Team player with adaptability and resilience Good computer literacy and ability to learn new tools quickly (CRM experience is an advantage) The Offer Permanent contract with full-time schedule (Monday to Friday, 09:00–18:00). Intensive paid training program covering tools, products, and customer engagement. Health insurance from day one. Meal allowance provided monthly. Holiday and Christmas bonuses included in the package. Modern office facilities in Lisbon (TP Tejo site) with cafeteria, lounge areas, and excellent public transport connections (Metro, Train, Bus). International, multicultural work environment with opportunities for career growth. Relocation support available, including accommodation in company apartments if required.

job_title: Danish Customer Support Agent - Athens, Greece
full_description: Travel to sunny Athens and work with the world's most famous brands! How would you feel if your office was just a breath away from beaches with crystal-clear waters? Does year-long sunshine – along with flavorful Greek cuisine – sound like an option you’d like to explore? Jump head-first into the Mediterranean experience and join our ever-growing Customer Care team in one of the most popular destinations in the world – Greece, Athens! Our client Our client is a global leader in outsourcing, providing customer acquisition management, customer care, technical support, debt collection, and social media services. They operate in 88 countries, serving 170 markets, and have 420.000 employees worldwide. You will be part of an extremely driven team in awesome Greece! Our client has been awarded as Best Workplace in Greece and as the Best Multilingual Omnichannel Contact Center in Europe! They offer complete training by certified instructors and many career development opportunities, so this is a unique chance to advance your career! Job Description As a Customer Support Agent, your role is, together with your team, to handle customer issues in a friendly, effective and professional manner via e-mail, chat, and phone. Be creative, friendly, and solution-oriented with customers and colleagues. Understand the need to meet expectations, rise above them, and go that extra mile for customers. Show a flexible approach to working in a changing and fast-growing environment. Work with some of the world's most respected brands. Requirements Being fluent (C2 level) in the Danish language; Good knowledge of English (B1-B2 level) required; Computer skills (basic skills mandatory, advanced skills like coding preferential); Good analytic skills and logical thinking; Excellent communication skills: verbal, written, listening skills; Proactive and quick learner, able to adapt and to continuously evolving needs to help clients grow their business on the advertising platform; Ability to multitask and work under pressure; EU citizenship or work permit for Greece. What you are offered Complete relocation package that includes: flight ticket to Greece, 2-week hotel accommodation, pick-up at the airport, assistance finding an own apartment + real estate fee covered by the client. Fixed monthly salary + bonus A contract focused on a long-term relationship Free Greek language lessons Private Health Coverage Professional growth & development opportunities Special HR team organizing events, sports tournaments, parties & trips Free support from the Employee Relations department during the hiring process, with regards to your Social Security number, Health Insurance (IKA), Tax Number, Bank account, etc. All employees have special benefits and discounts for services and products in Greece Benefits of Greece Greece has an enviable history and culture, climate, and cuisine – and yet, the cost of living is among the lowest in Europe, according to Greek authorities and the EURES network. No wonder Greece is a popular destination for tourists and expats alike. Along with the great food and cheap cost of living, the quality of life in Athens is very high. The city is safe compared to many major cities in Europe and much more peaceful. Aside from the city’s historical influence, the city boasts a large commercial area home to many big-name brands.  For many expats looking to move abroad to a vibrant city, Athens is a perfect choice.

GESTOR(A) DE SEGUROS DE SAÚDE ; DOMÍNIO DO FRANCÊS (ESCRITO E FALADO)  É OBRIGATÓRIO TRANSMITE CONFIANÇA E SIMPLICIDADE AOS SEUS CLIENTES NAS SUAS SOLICITAÇÕES DIÁRIAS, POR TELEFONE E E-MAIL, APOIANDO-SE NA SUA EXPERIÊNCIA TÉCNICA ¿ EXECUTA OS ATOS NECESSÁRIOS NOS PROCESSOS DE ADESÃO, ATUALIZAÇÃO DE DADOS, ELABORA ORÇAMENTOS E TRATA DE TODAS AS PRESTAÇÕES AOS ADERENTES ¿ RESPEITA OS COMPROMISSOS DE PRAZO, QUALIDADE E CONFORMIDADE ASSUMIDOS COM OS CLIENTES ¿ CONTRIBUI PARA A OTIMIZAÇÃO DOS PROCESSOS, ATRAVÉS DE FEEDBACKS REGULARES E PARTICIPAÇÃO EM PROJETOS

job_title: German Customer Support Advisor for AirBnb in Lisbon
full_description: Are you looking for an exciting opportunity to live and work in Portugal? Join our team as an Airbnb Customer Support Advisor (German & English) and take the next step in your career while experiencing life in a beautiful new country! This role offers you the chance to work for one of the world's most well-known travel platforms, helping Airbnb hosts and guests navigate claims, disputes, and support inquiries -all while enjoying the vibrant culture, sunny beaches, and incredible lifestyle Portugal has to offer. About the Role Join our team as an Airbnb Aircover Support Advisor, where you'll play a key role in ensuring a seamless experience for Airbnb’s hosts and guests. You will be responsible for handling inquiries, claims, and urgent situations with professionalism and empathy. Your focus will be on investigating and resolving claims under Airbnb’s Host Damage Protection, Host Liability Insurance, and Experience Liability Insurance. Key Responsibilities Provide exceptional support through inbound/outbound calls, messaging, and chat. Investigate and resolve claims related to property damage, disputes, and safety concerns. Apply Airbnb’s policies to ensure fair and efficient resolutions. Escalate issues when necessary, prioritizing urgent and sensitive matters. Compose accurate and thoughtful responses to customer queries. Implement emergency plans and provide clear communication during critical situations. Utilize trauma-informed methodologies for handling complex cases. Research and troubleshoot problems using available resources. Maintain data security and accuracy on Airbnb’s systems. Identify process and product issues, providing feedback for improvement. Requirements Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to manage complex cases. Excellent communication skills in German and English (written & spoken). Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment. 1-3 years of experience in claims handling, dispute resolution, fraud/risk investigation, insurance, or healthcare claims is a big plus. Experience estimating damages related to property, automobile, or watercraft losses is a plus. Compensation & Benefits Gross Monthly Salary Language Bonus Performance Bonus Holiday Bonus Christmas Bonus Medical & Dental Insurance: Provided after 6 months of employment Annual Leave: 22 business days, as per Portuguese law Public Holidays: Compensated according to Portuguese labor regulations Relocation Support Travel Reimbursement: Up to 200 (after 3 months with proof of ticket) Accommodation Allowance: Up to 360/month for the first 3 months Assistance in finding temporary and permanent housing Training & Onboarding Fully paid training period is included in the contract. If you're passionate about providing excellent customer service and want to be part of a global community-driven company, apply today!

job_title: ELETROMECÂNICO, ELETRICISTA E OUTROS INSTALADORES DE MÁQUINAS E EQUIPAMENTOS ELÉTRICOS
full_description: Você será responsável por realizar trabalhos de campo relacionados à instalação, desinstalação e reinstalação do Stratio Databox, a nossa unidade de recolha de dados de veiculos, seguindo os processos definidos.Tarefas:Realizar trabalhos de campo ou suporte remoto para instalar a Solução de Hardware;Realizar trabalhos de campo ou suporte remoto para corrigir problemas na Solução de Hardware da Stratio que afetem o serviço;Ministrar formação para clientes e parceiros sobre o uso das soluções de hardware da Stratio;Reportar o progresso do trabalho ao supervisor e ao líder do projeto;Representar a Stratio de forma profissional diante do cliente;Criar manuais de instalação de acordo com os procedimentos internos;Criar cabos elétricos conforme os procedimentos internos.O que acreditamos ser necessário para esta função:Experiência na área elétrica, incluindo o uso de multímetros;Carta de condução categoria B;Total disponibilidade e flexibilidade para viagens nacionais e internacionais, espere estar na estrada entre 2 a 3 semanas por mês, longe de casa;Disponibilidade para trabalhar aos fins de semana e/ou em horários noturnos, quando necessário;Alto nível de autonomia e capacidade de trabalhar sob pressão;Usuário independente da língua inglesa;Fluência em português, espanhol ou francês.Pontos Bonus:Conhecimento no uso de Equipamentos de Diagnóstico;Conhecimento e compreensão de redes de comunicação veicular;Entendimento sobre OBD, UDS, FMS, ISO 15765, J1939, J1708, KWP2000 ou qualquer outro protocolo utilizado em redes de veículos;Experiência prévia em manutenção automotiva/elétrica.

As tarefas a desenvolver pelo candidato são: lavagem e limpeza da parte exterior e interior de carros, usando máquinas de alta pressão, panos, escovas e aspiradores. As tarefas incluem também a aspiração de tapetes e estofos, limpeza de vidros e espelhos, aplicação de ceras protetoras na pintura e secagem do veículo. Além disso, pode envolver tarefas de manutenção como verificação e troca de fluidos e filtros, verificação da pressão dos pneus e substituição de lâmpadas e palhetas dos limpa para-brisas.

job_title: Italian-Speaking Content Moderators for TikTok in Lisbon! - Start 19th o...
full_description: As the leading platform for short-form mobile video, our client’s mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. With a global community of over 1 billion users, they lead with curiosity, strive for excellence, and embrace challenges with confidence and innovation. Starting date: 19th of May We are now looking for Italian-speaking Content Moderators to join the team in Lisbon. In this role, you will play a vital part in maintaining a safe, engaging, and legally compliant environment on the platform by moderating Seller, Product, Live, and Short Video content. Your responsibilities include: Ensuring that content uploaded to the platform complies with legal regulations and community standards. Helping to develop, improve, and maintain content safety guidelines to protect online communities. Contributing to the optimization of content management strategies for short-form videos. Collaborating with supervisors and team members to support moderation processes and goals. Your profile: Fluency in Italian (at least C1 level) + B2 level of English Availability to work in shifts and weekends Excellent communication (verbal and written) and interpersonal skills Quick learner and adaptable to learn new processes, concepts, and skills Excellent organizational and time management skills Strong attention to detail and a desire to deliver accurately, efficiently, and to a high standard Have a neutral mindset to alternative video content that needs classification Offer: Fixed monthly salary Language Premium Bonus Meal allowance: 7.17 monthly Pleasant and inspiring working atmosphere; Opportunity to be part of a rapidly expanding global organization; New office facilities in a convenient location in Lisbon; Training & development opportunities; Relocation allowance & relocation support (For candidates moving from abroad). Apply now and start your career supporting this exciting team!

job_title: TÉCNICO DE NÍVEL INTERMÉDIO DE APOIO SOCIAL
full_description: O candidato deverá saber planear, organizar e avaliar atividades de caracter educativo, cultural, desportivo , social, lúdico, turístico e recreativo, em contexto institucional, tendo em conta o serviço em que está integrado e as necessidades do grupo de trabalho com vista a melhorar a sua qualidade de vida e  a qualidade da sua inserção e interação social.

As a Senior Tax Technology Expert (f/m/d) for the Digital Tax Eco-System, you will help shape the framework for digital transformation, especially in relation to the introduction of a global tax engine within the SAP S4 implementation for Siemens Group. What we offer you - An attractive remuneration package- Access to Siemens share plans- 30 days of paid vacation and a variety of flexible work schedules that allow time off for you and your family- 2 to 3 days of mobile working per week as a global standard- Flexible training opportunities for both your professional and personal development that you can tailor to your interests Since each of over 300,000 team members feels that other benefits are particularly important, and we cannot list our entire benefit portfolio here, you can find more information here ( https://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs/benefits-what-we-offer.html ) . The individual benefits are subject to regulatory, contractual, or corporate conditions. You’ll make an impact - You will be part of the project team responsible for rolling out a global tax engine across several projects. - Collaboration with Tax Governance, Siemens IT, and external partners will be a key part of your daily work to ensure a forward-looking Siemens IT landscape supported by the right tools. - You will contribute to innovative digital advancements in Siemens’ tax function for VAT/GST by developing and implementing concepts in collaboration with your team, always considering cross-country requirements. - You will participate in projects and act as an interface between departments, including supporting the ongoing development of existing solutions. Your defining qualities - Education- Completed bachelor's studies in economics, law with a focus on taxation, or a comparable field. - Certified tax advisor or equivalent qualification - Experience & Skills- At least five years of professional experience in indirect taxation, with a focus on VAT (consulting, projects, compliance, processes, and digitalization)- In-depth knowledge of global indirect tax requirements for implementing tax determination solutions- Strong foundation in IT and solid understanding of SAP FI, SD, and MM processes- Extensive experience with automated tax determination solutions (e.g., Vertex) and solid knowledge of software for indirect tax compliance and reporting- Very good knowledge of tax authority structures and workflows in key Siemens countries and at the EU level- Project management experience, ideally with exposure to digitalization or digital business models- Familiarity with waterfall and agile methodologies - Wasy of working: - Structured and analytical approach combined with a high level of initiative- Ability to manage complex projects and collaborate across functions and cultures - Languages- Your strong communication skills enable you to negotiate confidently in both German and English. You are much more than your qualifications, and we believe in the potential of every single candidate. We look forward to getting to know you! Your individual personality and perspective are important to us. We create a working environment that reflects the diversity of the society and support you in your personal and professional development. Let’s get to know your authentic personality and create a better future together with us. As an equal-opportunity employer ( https://www.siemens.com/de/de/unternehmen/jobs/arbeiten-bei-siemens/inklusion.html )  we are happy to consider applications from individuals with disabilities. About us We are responsible for the global implementation of digitalization within the Siemens Global Business Services Tax department. In doing so, we draw on proven methods as well as new technologies. We are in constant, trusted exchange with our colleagues from Tax, Siemens IT, and external providers to ensure "best of breed" solutions for a future-oriented and technologically secure digitalization of our global tax function. We closely monitor regulatory changes and analyze their impact on the current and future landscape. In this context, we act in alignment with the Siemens IT strategy and its transformation in the coming years. www.siemens.de/careers ( http://www.siemens.com/de/en/company/jobs.html )  – if you would like to find out more about jobs & careers at Siemens. FAQ ( http://www.siemens.com/de/de/unternehmen/jobs/karrieren-entdecken.html )  – if you need further information on the application process.

job_title: Chargé / Chargée Support client (A Lisbonne au Portugal) (H/F)
full_description: Chargé / Chargée Support client (A Lisbonne au Portugal) Vous êtes francophone, intéressé(e) par le service client et vous rêvez d'une expérience internationale au Portugal ? Bonne nouvelle : pas besoin de parler portugais ! Si vous maîtrisez le français et l'anglais, vous pouvez rejoindre une entreprise internationale reconnue et vivre une belle aventure à l'étranger. Nous recherchons un-e Chargé / Chargée Support client enthousiaste et orienté-e client pour le compte d'une compagnie internationale renommée. Rejoignez une équipe multiculturelle et pleine d'énergie, et booster votre CV avec une expérience à l'international. Votre mission, si vous l'acceptez : - Répondre aux clients ayant pris contact avec l'entreprise. - Comprendre leurs besoins et proposer des solutions adaptées. - Accompagner les clients tout au long de leur parcours avec des interactions personnalisées. - Développer la confiance et un suivi attentif. - Assurer le support quotidien des clients par téléphone, chat et e-mail. - Remonter les retours clients pour contribuer à l'amélioration continue des services proposées. Votre profil - Vous parlez français couramment (niveau C1/C2) et avez un anglais courant (B2 minimum) ; - Vous êtes à l'aise à l'oral comme à l'écrit, avec un excellent sens du relationnel ; - Vous êtes curieux-se, adaptable et motivé-e par les défis. Ce que notre client offre : - Salaire fixe + prime de performance ; - Formation complète dès votre arrivée et accompagnement personnalisé ; - Perspectives d'évolution réelles au sein d'un grand groupe international ; - Assurance santé dès le premier jour ; - Frais de vol remboursés pour votre installation au Portugal - Billet annuel aller-retour vers votre pays d'origine (Europe) ; - Logement en colocation meublée (charges incluses) ; - Repas sains et à prix réduits sur place ; - Accompagnement complet dans vos démarches administratives (numéro fiscal, sécurité sociale, etc.) - Cours de portugais et activités sportives possibles - Evénements internes possibles - Une expérience internationale différenciante sur votre CV, valorisable pour la suite de votre parcours professionnel. Le petit plus : Rejoignez une équipe internationale, vivez une expérience professionnelle et humaine unique à Lisbonne. Lieu de travail : Lisbonne (Portugal), une ville ensoleillée et attractive en Europe. Durée du contrat : 12 mois (possibilité de renouvellement) Démarrage : Entre Novembre 2025 et Janvier 2026 Rémunération : à partir de 1 250,00€ par mois ou à partir de 1050€ par mois avec logement d'entreprise meublé fourni (logement meublé charges incluses) Procedure : - Entretien Cabinet de Recrutement - Test Français et Anglais - Entretien avec le client L'entreprise : Rejoignez notre client, une entreprise internationale renommée.

CONTEXTE ET DEFINITION DU POSTE : Premier producteur indépendant français de carottes, issu d'une longue lignée d'agriculteurs, Planète Végétal est situé en Gironde au cœur du Parc Naturel Régional des Landes de Gascogne (entre Bordeaux et le Bassin d'Arcachon). Nous cultivons également des carottes dans la Vallée du Tage au Portugal. Nous recherchons une personnalité issue du monde agricole, disposant d'une expérience significative dans la gestion d'une exploitation et aimant travailler sur le terrain dans une interface entre la production agricole et la direction. Vous avez de bonnes connaissances agronomiques et une sensibilité aux conditions climatiques pour anticiper les travaux dans une structure à forte activité saisonnière. Vous êtes capable de vous investir dans les différents projets avec loyauté, persévérance et de faire vivre votre fonction en vous impliquant dans les missions suivantes : 1 - Suivi des cultures (70 à 100 ha) Suivi de toutes les cultures depuis l'implantation jusqu'à la récolte Elaboration des plannings de semis carottes et de plantation poireaux Diagnostic des maladies et ravageurs Elaboration des plannings d'intervention Evaluation de l'efficacité des interventions Gestion de la traçabilité et application des normes avec la pérennisation de la certification Globalgap Achat des intrants et gestion des stocks 2 - Organisation et Management (équipe de 3 personnes + saisonniers) Gestion du parc matériel (entretien, réparations, conduite du matériel, irrigation.) Gestion du personnel (recrutement, suivi administratif, management...) Gestion de la logistique aval avec le transporteur Gestion des fournisseurs 3 - Gestion des coûts Elaboration et suivi du budget Gestion de la trésorerie, des règlements fournisseurs en lien avec la Direction financière Suivi, contrôle et validation des factures Optimisation des coûts Liens étroits avec l'expert-comptable 4 - Gestion des informations Assurer la traçabilité du suivi des cultures Réaliser la traçabilité des interventions Effectuer un reporting journalier/ hebdomadaire auprès de la Direction Etre force de proposition pour optimiser l'activité 5 - Participation active aux différents travaux et opérations de production suivant les besoins pour répondre aux impératifs et tenir compte des exigences en vigueur PROFIL RECHERCHE : De formation agricole supérieure (Bac+2 à +5) avec une expérience minimum de 5 à 10 ans dans la gestion d'une exploitation, vous partagez les valeurs du travail et du respect de la terre. Vous avez une forte capacité de travail et disposez d'un très bon relationnel. Vous êtes honnête et faites preuve de rigueur. Vous êtes organisé(e) et doté(e) d'un esprit d'analyse, de synthèse. Vous maîtrisez les outils en bureautique et connaissez les nouvelles technologies en agriculture (GPS, sondes, capteurs, automate etc...). Vous parlez un portugais opérationnel. Poste basé à SALVATERRA DE MAGOS au PORTUGAL

RESPONSABILITÉS : Le Groupe LAUAK recherche son futur Directeur Supply Chain Portugal pour ses 2 sites industriels situés à Setúbal et Grândola (proximité de Lisbonne). En tant que Directeur Supply Chain (HF) vous assurez l'intégrité et l'optimisation des flux entre les fournisseurs, l'entreprise et les clients. Vos principales missions seront les suivantes : • Coordonner et organiser les différents maillons de la chaîne logistique, de l'approvisionnement à l'expédition ; • Garantir la performance logistique des sites et la satisfaction client ; • Assurer le management des équipes Supply Chain locales (> 80 personnes) ; • Assurer le reporting auprès de la Direction sites et de la Direction Supply Chain ; • Contribuer aux actions d'amélioration continue des outils et process. PROFIL RECHERCHÉ : • Vous bénéficiez d'une expérience confirmée d'au moins 10 ans en supply chain industrielle. • Reconnu(e) pour votre rigueur et votre organisation, vous savez vous montrer autonome et force de proposition. • Orienté(e) résultats, vous êtes en mesure de piloter la performance et fédérer des équipes dans un environnement international (anglais/français). • Vous êtes disponible pour une expatriation au Portugal (poste basé sur site à Setúbal). • Anglais courant, tant à l'écrit qu'à l'oral.
PRETENDE RECRUTAR ASSSITENTE DE DIRETOR/A FINANCEIRO: - APOIO NA GESTÃO FINANCEIRA: PREPARAÇÃO DE RELATÓRIOS; - APOIO NA AREA CONTABILÍSTICA: RECONCILIAÇÃO BANCÁRIA, LANÇAMENTOS.

A empresa pretende contratar um especialista em gestão e empreendedorismo, com formação superior em Ciências Empresariais, Gestão, Economia ou áreas similares e experiência em apoio à criação de negócios e desenvolvimento estratégico. Este profissional será responsável por acompanhar novos empresários e startups, fornecendo suporte na elaboração de planos de negócio, definição de modelos estratégicos e identificação de oportunidades de crescimento. Sendo, que este será o responsável pelas seguintes áreas: Apoio à Criação de Empresas e Empreendedorismo e Planeamento Estratégico e Crescimento Sustentado

Wollen Sie die Zukunft des Gesundheitswesens mitgestalten? Wir bei Siemens Healthineers setzen auf Menschen, die ihre Energie und Leidenschaft diesem Ziel widmen – das sagt schon unser Unternehmensname. Siemens Healthineers steht für Pioniergeist unserer Mitarbeitenden, gepaart mit unserer langen Tradition als weltweit führender Technologiekonzern in der stets dynamischen Gesundheitsbranche. Wir bieten ein flexibles und dynamisches Umfeld voller Gelegenheiten, über sich hinaus zu wachsen, um sich persönlich und beruflich weiterzuentwickeln. Klingt das interessant für Sie? Dann werden Sie Teil unseres globalen Teams als Senior Expert*in (w/m/d) – Treasury AML/KYC, um robuste Compliance-Rahmenwerke zu gestalten, Prozessexzellenz voranzutreiben und sicherzustellen, dass unsere Treasury-Aktivitäten weltweit den höchsten regulatorischen Standards entsprechen. Wählen Sie den besten Ort für Ihre Arbeit - im Rahmen dieser Stelle ist es in Abstimmung mit Ihrer Führungskraft möglich, bis zu einem durchschnittlichen Volumen von 60% der jeweiligen Arbeitszeit mobil (innerhalb Deutschlands) zu arbeiten. Noch mehr Flexibilität? Mobiles Arbeiten aus dem Ausland ist unter bestimmten Voraussetzungen und in ausgewählten Ländern für bis zu 30 Tage im Jahr möglich. Zudem ist diese Stelle in Vollzeit oder Teilzeit mit mind. 30h/Woche zu besetzen. Diese Stelle kann in Erlangen, Deutschland oder Lissabon, Portugal, besetzt werden Ihre Aufgaben und Verantwortlichkeiten: - Mit Ihrer fachlichen Expertise agieren Sie als Fachexpert*in im Bereich Treasury, um AML- und KYC-Prozesse weltweit aufrechtzuerhalten.- Sie analysieren bestehende AML- und KYC-Prozesse innerhalb der Treasury-Aktivitäten, identifizieren Ineffizienzen, regulatorische Lücken und Verbesserungspotenziale, führen die Implementierung optimierter oder neuer Prozesse an oder unterstützen diese, um globale Compliance und operative Effektivität sicherzustellen.- Sie beobachten regulatorische Änderungen und passen interne Verfahren proaktiv an, um die Übereinstimmung zu gewährleisten.- Sie beraten zu treasury-bezogenen Compliance-Vorschriften und den entsprechenden Kontrollen im Hinblick auf AML-Prozesse und KYC-Anforderungen.- Sie überwachen und bewerten Risiken im Zusammenhang mit externen Zahlungsdienstleistern und stellen die Einhaltung von BaFin- sowie anderer regulatorischer Standards sicher.- Sie beraten zu Geschäftsmodellen und Finanzstrukturen, um Lizenzanforderungen wie Zahlungsdienste, Geldtransfer, Kreditvergabe, Einlagen- oder Garantiegeschäft zu identifizieren.- Sie arbeiten mit internen Stakeholdern zusammen, um die ordnungsgemäße Lizenzierung für Finanzaktivitäten (z. B. Zahlungsdienste, Leasing, Kreditvergabe, Versicherung) sicherzustellen.- Sie entwickeln und führen relevante Schulungsprogramme für Treasury und Finance durch.- Sie unterstützen Digitalisierungsinitiativen und Compliance-Projekte innerhalb Ihres Verantwortungsbereichs. Mehr über dieses Geschäftsfeld erfahren Sie unter https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/products-services ( https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/products-services ) Ihre Qualifikationen und Erfahrung: - Sie verfügen über ein abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium in Finanzwesen, Betriebswirtschaft, Rechtswissenschaften, Volkswirtschaft oder einem vergleichbaren Fachgebiet.- Sie bringen langjährige Erfahrung in den Bereichen Compliance, Risikomanagement, Treasury oder Regulatory Advisory im Finanzdienstleistungssektor oder in der Unternehmens-Treasury mit.- Zusätzliche Qualifikationen/Weiterbildungen in Compliance, AML oder Risikomanagement (z. B. CAMS, ICA, ACAMS) sind ein starkes Plus.- Sie haben nachweisbare Erfahrung in der Implementierung von AML- und KYC-Prozessen.- Sie verfügen über fundierte Kenntnisse der AML-/KYC-Vorschriften, der Prävention von Finanzkriminalität sowie der internationalen Compliance-Standards.- Sie sind vertraut mit Anforderungen an Finanzlizenzen, einschließlich Zahlungsdienste, Kreditvergabe, Leasing und Garantiegeschäft.- Sie besitzen Kenntnisse der BaFin-Anforderungen sowie anderer relevanter regulatorischer Rahmenwerke (z. B. EMIR, Dodd-Frank, MiFID II). Ihr Profil und Ihre Fähigkeiten: - Sie denken strategisch und besitzen nachweislich die Fähigkeit, komplexe Probleme eigenständig zu lösen, vielschichtige Sachverhalte klar darzustellen und durch ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten sowie Detailgenauigkeit kontinuierliche Prozessverbesserungen voranzutreiben.- Um sich in unserem internationalen Teamumfeld sowie mit internationalen Stakeholdern mühelos auszutauschen, verfügen Sie über exzellente Englisch- und Deutschkenntnisse.- Sie fühlen sich in einem globalen Umfeld wohl und zeichnen sich durch den Aufbau starker Zusammenarbeit über verschiedene Funktionen hinweg aus – einschließlich Legal, Compliance, Treasury und Finance.- Sie verbinden Effizienz mit Genauigkeit und begegnen Herausforderungen mit einer proaktiven „Can-do“-Mentalität. Unser globales Team: Siemens Healthineers ist ein weltweit führendes Medizintechnikunternehmen. Mit mehr als 73.000 engagierten Mitarbeitenden in über 70 Ländern gestalten wir die Zukunft des Gesundheitswesens. Jeden Tag profitieren etwa fünf Millionen Patient*innen weltweit von unseren innovativen Technologien und Dienstleistungen aus den Bereichen Diagnostik und therapeutische Bildgebung, Labordiagnostik und molekulare Medizin sowie von unseren digitalen Gesundheits- und Unternehmensdienstleistungen. Unsere Kultur: Unsere Unternehmenskultur schätzt verschiedene Blickwinkel, offene Diskussionen und den Willen, Konventionen in Frage zu stellen. Ständiger Wandel gehört zu unserem Arbeitsalltag. Wir wollen in unserer Branche Veränderungen vorantreiben, statt nur darauf zu reagieren. Deswegen laden wir Sie ein, sich neuen Herausforderungen zu stellen, eigene Ideen auszutesten und Erfolge zu feiern. Besuchen Sie auch unsere Karriere-Seite unter https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/de/careers ( https://www.siemens-healthineers.com/de/careers ) Wir legen Wert auf Diversität und Chancengleichheit und freuen uns über Bewerbungen mit vielfältigen Hintergründen und insbesondere von Menschen mit Behinderung. #myabilityshs Sie möchten mehr erfahren und erste Fragen gern persönlich klären – Sprechen Sie uns an: recruitinggersupport.func@siemens-healthineers.com . Kontaktperson dieser Stellenausschreibung ist Petra Hübener. Wir nehmen den Schutz Ihrer Daten und die Einhaltung der DSGVO und anderer Datenschutzgesetze ernst. Deshalb bitten wir Sie, uns Ihren Lebenslauf nicht per E-Mail zu schicken. Bitte legen Sie ein Profil in unserer Talent Community an, um Ihren Lebenslauf hochzuladen. Daran erkennen wir, dass Sie an Karrieremöglichkeiten bei uns interessiert sind und können Sie zu relevanten Stellen benachrichtigen. Klicken Sie hier ( https://jobs.siemens-healthineers.com/de_DE/searchjobs/RegistrationMethods ) , um ein Profil anzulegen. An alle Personalvermittlungsagenturen: Die Personalbeschaffung bei Siemens Healthineers wird intern verwaltet. Externe Unterstützung ist nur dann gestattet, wenn eine qualifizierte Agentur einen formellen Vertrag mit uns abgeschlossen hat. Unaufgeforderte Bewerbungen und Empfehlungen von Kandidatenprofilen ohne aktuelle Lieferantenvereinbarung begründen keine Zustimmung und sind somit nicht gebührenpflichtig. Wir löschen und vernichten nicht angeforderte Informationen und empfehlen, von derartigen Praktiken abzusehen. Wir danken Ihnen für die Einhaltung unserer Richtlinien. Siemens Healthineers Deutschland wurde mit dem Zertifikat Great Place to Work® ausgezeichnet.

job_title: Chargé(e) de clientèle - Analyste crédit - H/F - Lisbonne (H/F)
full_description: Tu vis déjà au Portugal et tu cherches un nouveau défi professionnel dans un environnement francophone stimulant ? Si tu es à l'aise au téléphone, que tu maîtrises parfaitement le français et que tu veux un poste stable avec de vraies responsabilités, cette opportunité est faite pour toi ! Envie de relever un nouveau défi à l'international ? Si tu es à l'aise au téléphone, que tu maîtrises parfaitement le français et que tu recherches un poste stable avec de réelles responsabilités, cette opportunité est faite pour toi ! À propos de Colybry et de ses partenaires Colybry ne recrute pas pour ses propres équipes, mais met en relation des talents francophones avec des entreprises partenaires basées à Lisbonne. Grâce à notre réseau privilégié, tu bénéficies d'une visibilité accrue et peux postuler simultanément auprès de plusieurs entreprises, augmentant ainsi tes chances de recrutement. Pourquoi Lisbonne ? Lisbonne combine le charme d'une ville historique et la modernité d'une capitale en plein essor. Avec son climat ensoleillé, sa culture riche et son ambiance conviviale, Lisbonne est une destination idéale pour allier carrière professionnelle et qualité de vie. Nous recherchons activement des Analystes de crédit / Chargés de clientèle pour rejoindre les équipes de nos partenaires à Lisbonne. Tes missions principales seront : Contacter les clients ayant réalisé une simulation ou une demande d'informations en ligne (aucune prospection à froid). Réaliser le premier échange téléphonique pour qualifier le besoin et la viabilité du dossier. Assurer le suivi des clients par téléphone et par mail. Collaborer avec les analystes bancaires et transmettre les dossiers complets. Profil Tu résides déjà au Portugal et souhaites t'investir durablement dans un poste stable. Excellente maîtrise du français, à l'oral comme à l'écrit. Aisance dans les échanges téléphoniques et écrits. Une expérience en relation client ou en commercial est un plus. Rigueur, sens de l'organisation et capacité d'analyse. Motivation à évoluer dans un poste stable, loin des environnements de call center classiques. Avantages Contrat CDI à temps plein offrant une réelle stabilité professionnelle Horaires fixes du lundi au vendredi (8h - 17h), week-ends libres Formation et accompagnement complets Perspectives d'évolution interne dans un environnement dynamique Soutien de Colybry dans les démarches administratives et la recherche de logement Intégration rapide dans une équipe bienveillante et stimulante

EXPERIENCIA EM CONTROLO E GESTÃO DE STOCKS SABER: RECEPÇAO E EXPEDICAO MERCADORIAS ORGANIZAÇAO E PLANEAMENTO DOS STOCKS REGISTOS E CONTROLO PLANEAMENTO COMPRAS ANALISE DADOS BONS CONHECIMENTOS INFORMATICOS DOMINIO DO PORTUGUES ESPANHOL (PREFERENCIAL) CARTA CONDUÇAO (PREFERENCIAL)

job_title: CONTABILISTA, AUDITOR, REVISOR OFICIAL DE CONTAS E SIMILARES
full_description: Candidato Requisitos técnicos: Bacharelato ou licenciatura em contabilidade fiscalidade; Bom domínio da língua inglesa Experiência profissional em Gabinete de contabilidade ; Requisitos pessoais: Organizado; Responsável; Proativo; Comunicativo; Capacidade de trabalho em equipa; Funções Classificação e Lançamento de Contabilidade; Analise de balancetes; Movimentos de Encerramentos de Contas; Preenchimento e envios de declarações Fiscais: Modelos 03, 10, 22, 30, 39, 45 entre outros; Modelo 22, IES e Dossier Fiscal; IVA Mensal e trimestral e pedido de reembolsos; Processamento de salários, e submissão das DMRs às Finanças e à Segurança Social;

job_title: DIRETOR E GERENTE DE RESTAURAÇÃO (RESTAURANTES E SIMILARES)
full_description: GESTOR DE TURNO PARA TRABALHAR NUM ESTABELECIMENTO DE RESTAURAÇÃO, COM EXPERIÊNCIA NA FUNÇÃO, CONHECIMENTOS BÁSICOS DE INFORMÁTICA NA ÓTICA DO UTILIZADOR E NOÇÕES DE INGLÊS AO NIVEL DA CONVERSAÇÃO. DISPONIBILIDADE PARA TRABALHAR EM HORÁRIOS ROTATIVOS E COM FOLGAS ROTATIVAS. FUNÇÕES: REALIZAÇÃO DE ENCOMENDAS DE ACORDO COM A PREVISÇÃO DE VENDAS, GESTÃO DO SERVIÇO E DAS RECLAMAÇÕES DOS CLIENTES, APOIAR NA ANALISE DE INDICADORES DE LOJA E IDENTIFICAR OPORTUNUDADES DE MELHORIAS E SOLUÇÕES, ASSEGURAR O CUMPRIMENTO DAS NORMAS DE HIGIENE E CONTROLOS ALIMENTARES, COORDENAÇÃO E FORMAÇÃO DE EQUIPAS. COM CARTA DE CONDUÇÃO.

️ Werde zum Guardian der Gaming-Community! Wusstest du? Online-Gaming-Welten sind riesige Universen voller Kreativität, Teamwork und Abenteuer, aber sie brauchen auch Helden, die für Fairness, Sicherheit und Respekt sorgen. Genau hier kommst du  ins Spiel!   Du brennst für Games, Community Culture und willst dazu beitragen, dass Spieler:innen weltweit in einer sicheren Umgebung spielen können? Dann starte jetzt deine Mission als Trust & Safety Specialist  in Lissabon - mitten im Herzen der internationalen Gaming-Szene. Und das Beste: Dein Arbeitgeber stellt dir auf Wunsch eine komplett möblierte Unterkunft  für deinen Start bereit! Deine Mission: Content Moderation: Überwache Chats & Inhalte, damit die Community geschützt bleibt. Analyse von Spieleraktivitäten – du erkennst, wenn etwas nicht richtig läuft. Aufdecken von Betrug, unfairen Aktionen & Auffälligkeiten im eSports-Bereich. ️ Einschätzung von sensiblen Situationen (z. B. Gefährdungen, eskalierende Chats, Verstöße gegen Richtlinien). Arbeit mit klaren Regeln & Tools, die dir sichere Entscheidungen ermöglichen. Perfekt für dich, wenn du: Deutsch sprichst und Englisch gut beherrschst (Training auf Englisch). Analytisch denken kannst & ein Auge für Details hast. Verantwortung übernehmen willst – gerade bei sensiblen Themen. Gaming liebst und Teil der globalen Community werden willst. Offen für ein Leben in Lissabon bist – Sonne, Strand & internationales Flair! Deine Benefits: Möblierte Unterkunft möglich – mit WG-Anschluss & kompletter Ausstattung. Full-Service Relocation: Abholung am Flughafen, Unterstützung bei Behörden & Papierkram. Moderner Arbeitsplatz im stylischen Office mit Gaming-Community-Flair. Geregelte Arbeitszeiten zwischen 08:00–18:00 Uhr ️ Wohnst du vor Ort? Auch top! Du kannst ohne Unterkunftsoption starten. Intensives Training (1 Woche) – bezahlt nach Abschluss. Attraktives Gesamtpaket inkl. Essenskarte, Zuschlägen & Boni. ️ Kostenloser jährlicher Flug nach Hause (innerhalb Europas) für internationale Kandidat:innen. Starttermin: Februar 2026 So bewirbst du dich: Lebenslauf hochladen Kurzgespräch mit einem Recruiter Online-Tests (Deutsch/Englisch) Finales Interview Vertragsangebot & dein Umzug nach Lissabon! Klimaschutz? Wir sind dabei! Wir kompensieren deinen Flug nach Portugal und senden dir nach dem Start ein persönliches Klimaschutzzertifikat. ️ Klingt nach deinem nächsten Level-Up? Dann sichere dir jetzt deinen Platz im Trust & Safety Team – und werde Teil einer Community, die weltweit Millionen Spieler schützt! ️

Deine Chance im Zentrum der Online-Werbewelt Du verstehst, dass Performance im digitalen Marketing kein Zufall ist, sondern das Ergebnis präziser Datenanalyse  und strategischer Optimierung . Bei uns hast du die Möglichkeit, als Fachexperte (Subject Matter Expert)  für hochkarätige internationale Kunden zu arbeiten und deren Werbekampagnen auf einer der weltweit führenden Online-Plattformen  (Google Ads oder ähnliche) zu perfektionieren. In dieser Rolle bist du der Motor für den Kampagnenerfolg im B2B-Bereich . Du bist nicht nur zuständig für die Umsetzung, sondern lieferst die strategischen Optimierungslösungen und Reports, die den Umsatz unserer Vertriebsteams vorantreiben. Du wirst Teil eines schnell wachsenden, mehrsprachigen Teams, das vor Ort und in direkter Zusammenarbeit mit internen Abteilungen eines führenden multinationalen Online-Unternehmens arbeitet. Deine Aufgaben Deine Kernaufgabe ist die Umsetzung und Optimierung von AdWords-Kampagnen  über die gesamte Palette der Plattformen (Search, GSN, Mobile, YouTube) hinweg. - Optimierungslösungen implementieren:  Du erstellst Kampagnen für hochvolumige Werbekunden und lieferst Keyword-Pakete, Gebots- und Budgetvorschläge. - Datenanalyse & Reporting:  Du sammelst und analysierst Daten auf Konto- und Kampagnenebene, um Optimierungsstrategien zu entwickeln und zu untermauern. - Vertriebsunterstützung:  Du identifizierst Optimierungsmöglichkeiten in Kundenkonten und hilfst den Sales Teams und Agenturen dabei, diese Chancen zu ergreifen und Gespräche zu führen. - Qualitätsmanagement:  Du stellst eine erstklassige Kundenbetreuung für die Account Leads sicher und bringst eigene Ideen zur Verbesserung operativer Prozesse ein. Dein Profil - Sprachkenntnisse:  Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse sind erforderlich. - Expertise:  Du bringst Erfahrung in Google Ads  oder einer ähnlichen Plattform sowie digitale Marketingerfahrung  (Client Service oder Account Management) mit. - Erfahrung:  Erfahrung im B2B-Umfeld und der aktive Umgang mit Online-Anwendungen (AdWords, Advertising etc.) ist von Vorteil. - Arbeitsweise:  Du besitzt eine ausgeprägte Fähigkeit zu kritischem Denken, Analyse und Liebe zum Detail, gepaart mit einer starken Arbeitsmoral und technischem Verständnis. Deine Benefits - Attraktives Gehalt:  Jahresgehalt von 23.000 € brutto  zuzüglich eines möglichen Signing Bonus von 2.500 € bis 3.000 €  (nach erfolgreichem Abschluss der Probezeit). - Moderne Umgebung:  Du arbeitest in einer angenehmen und inspirierenden Atmosphäre in neuen Büros in attraktiver Lage in LACS Santos, Lissabon . - Entwicklung:  Umfassende Schulungen zu weltklasse Plattformen und Tools sowie langfristige Entwicklungs- und Karrieremöglichkeiten in einem schnell expandierenden globalen Umfeld. - ️ Umzugshilfe:  Relocation Allowance & Support  für Kandidaten, die aus dem Ausland umziehen. - Arbeitsmodell:  Hybrid-Modell in Lissabon. Wichtige Daten - Starttermine:  Januar 2026. - Ort:  Lissabon, LACS Santos (Hybrid-Modell). So läuft der Bewerbungsprozess - Sende uns deinen Lebenslauf (gern auf Englisch) über das Onlineformular - Wir melden uns telefonisch bei dir mit allen Details zur Stelle - Du lernst deine potenzielle Führungskraft in einem lockeren Gespräch kennen - Im Anschluss bespricht HR dein Vertragsangebot mit dir – inkl. aller Rahmenbedingungen - Du reichst dein Führungszeugnis ein – und bekommst dein Jobangebot!

job_title: Italian Content Moderator in Athens, Greece
full_description: Work in Greece as a Content Moderator, where ancient history, stunning landscapes, and modern innovation meet. Known for its beautiful islands, vibrant cities, and rich cultural heritage, Greece offers endless opportunities. In this role, you’ll ensure online content is safe, engaging, and appropriate, all while enjoying a relaxed Mediterranean lifestyle. With a growing job market and plenty of career growth, Greece is the perfect destination for both professional and personal development! Your Role as a Content Moderator… As a Content Moderator, you’ll review and manage user-generated content, ensuring it aligns with company guidelines. You’ll address inappropriate content, respond to user inquiries, and collaborate with the team to improve moderation policies, all while maintaining confidentiality and discretion. Daily responsibilities: Moderate Content: Review and manage user-generated content on the platform, including text, images, and videos, ensuring it aligns with community guidelines. Evaluate and Take Action: Assess content against company policies and guidelines, removing or escalating content as necessary. Respond to Inquiries: Address user reports of inappropriate content quickly and professionally, ensuring effective communication. Collaborate and Improve: Work with the team to identify content trends, and suggest improvements for moderation practices and policies. Maintain Confidentiality: Handle sensitive information with discretion, ensuring a high level of confidentiality and professionalism. What We Offer Relocation Support: Help with the moving process and free accommodation provided for the first month! Competitive Wages: Enjoy very competitive pay and job stability. Training: Fully paid training to set you up for success. Healthcare: Access private healthcare for peace of mind. Growth Opportunities: Continuous learning and career development. Diverse Culture: Work in a safe, friendly, diverse, and tech-driven environment. Team Spirit & Wellness Program: Join an international team with celebrations, skill-building initiatives, and team events, while enjoying the EverBetter wellness program, including an on-site fitness room and a personal trainer. Key Requirements: Fluent level of the Italian language (C1/C2) Good English (at least B2) both verbal and written Excellent attention to detail and ability to identify subtle nuances in content that may violate policies. Ability to work efficiently under minimal supervision and maintain productivity. Strong interpersonal and communication skills. Experience with content moderation tools and platforms is a plus. Must hold EU citizenship or valid work permit for Greece About Greece In Greece, you'll find the perfect blend of career opportunities and a high quality of life. With a vibrant job market, affordable cost of living, and stunning Mediterranean landscapes, the country offers both professional and personal fulfillment. Whether you're exploring ancient ruins, enjoying outdoor activities, or relaxing on the coast, Greece provides endless opportunities for growth and adventure! This is our Client With 170,000 associates worldwide, our client powers the best experiences for over 750 of the world’s leading digital-first brands. Using innovative solutions, advanced technology, and expert support, they ensure smooth and meaningful interactions while meeting the unique needs of their clients on a global scale Be our next Content Moderator and apply now in 30 seconds!

Description of tasks: We are now looking for a personal assistant and travel assistant who will be a bit of a "spider in the web" and act as support for our CEO who has chronic fatigue syndrome, in everyday life in his travelling and efforts to heal and create a healing retreat for people with the same condition. Take note; The position will be majority of time outside of Sweden, mostly Portugal, so you will need to be able to be away from home at least 80% of the year. Examples of work tasks; Support our CEO on trips, driving, administer travel logistics, hotel bookings, health promotion activities, daily walks etc. Help with everyday chores. For example. shopping, making phone calls, handling e-mail, accompanying the CEO on various health related activities, etc. Description of qualifications: Who are you ? We are looking for you who have previous work experience in personal assistance, medical field, service or working with people. Speaks fluent English. Driving license is a requirement. As a person, you are calm, empathetic, service-oriented, responsive, have initiative and are open to learning new things. ------------------------------------------------------------------- Beskrivning av arbetsuppgifter: Vi söker nu en personlig assistent samt rese-assistent som skall vara lite av en "spindel i nätet" och agera stöd åt vår VD som har kroniskt utmattningssymdrom på resor samt i processen att skapa ett läkningsretreat för människor med samma hälsoproblematik. Notera; Positionen äger rum mestedels på resande fot i Portugal, så du behöver kunna vara hemifrån åtminstone 80% av året. Exempel på arbetsuppgifter; Stöd till vår VD på resor, köra bil, administrera reselogistik, hotellbokningar, hälsofrämjande aktiviteter, m.m. Hjälp med vardagssysslor. T.ex. handla, ringa telefonsamtal, hantera epost, följa med VD'n till olika ärenden, m.m. Beskrivning av kvalifikationer: Vem är du ? Vi söker dig som har tidigare arbetslivserfarenhet inom service eller jobbat med människor. Talar flytande svenska och engelska. Körkort är ett krav. Som person är du lugn, inkännande, serviceinriktad, lyhörd, har initiativförmåga och öppen för att lära dig nya saker.

Experience the power of a game-changing career Are you looking for what’s next? We’re a global technology and services leader that powers the brands of the future. We help well-known brands — the ones you use every day — improve their businesses with technology and integrated solutions, in over 70 countries. And we’re proud to be recognized with awards such as "World's Best Workplaces," “Best Companies for Career Growth,” and “Best Company Culture,” year after year. If you’re looking to grow and be inspired, as a Technical Support Digital Ads in Lisbon, Portugal (On-Site) you will make use of your skills, supporting our client's different areas of social media. And be an active part in ensuring client guidelines, promoting, and actively participating in the service improvements provided to all users. Career growth and personal development We’ll give you all the training, cutting-edge technologies, and the continuing support you’ll need to succeed. At Concentrix, there’s a real career and personal growth potential. About 80% of our managers and leaders have been promoted from within! That’s why we offer a range of FREE Learning and Leadership Development programs designed to set you on your way to the kind of career you’ve always envisioned. What you will do in this role As a Technical Support Digital Ads, you will: From the beginning, you will take an active role in continuously seeking for initiatives to enhance service and improve the overall user experience. Handle and resolve end to end product troubleshooting and customer support for our client advertising products, on case volumes across email and chat channels Own and drive query resolution through collaboration within house Product Operations & Eng groups to resolve all types of generic, technical or product queries Drive overall Customer Satisfaction metrics ensuring service quality through case journey, providing regular updates across touch points Drive adherence to service levels across channels and achieve Best in Class productivity, impact resolution times for end customer Partner with inhouse technical specialists to educate advertisers on product features and common issue types Your qualifications Concentrix is a great match if you: Are fluent, verbal and written in English (C1) Have a degree in Marketing or related field Have experience in Digital Marketing Have experience on paid campaign management (mandatory) Have experience in a Contact Centre, Service program for any Advertising Tech company Have the ability to work as a team member, as well as independently Are fluent with any social media products usage and basic understanding of digital advertising If you feel you don’t check every box, we still encourage you to apply. We'll do our best to match you with the right job, whether it’s this or another role. What’s in it for you In this role, we offer benefits that help you support your unique lifestyle: Competitive salary (base and additional bonuses) Central location in Lisbon, Portugal Bring-a-friend (referral) bonus opportunities Full paid training on the company and the project you'll be working on Career development programs Experience the best version of you! If all this feels like the perfect next step in your career journey, we want to hear from you. Apply today and discover why over 440k+ game-changers around the globe call Concentrix their “employer of choice.” Concentrix is an equal-opportunity employer We're proudly united as one team, one company, globally. We're committed to equal employment opportunities for all candidates and a work environment free from discrimination and harassment. All our recruitment practices are based on business needs, job requirements, and professional qualifications, without regard to race, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, family or parental status, national origin, disability, or any other classification protected by applicable national laws. Eligibility to work In accordance with Portugal’s law, only applicants who are legally authorized to work in Portugal will be considered for this position. Required language: English

Boa comunicação e espírito de colaboração para integração na equipa também são desejáveis.Este perfil assegura que o acabamento das peças atenda aos elevados padrões de qualidade exigidos pela empresa, contribuindo diretamente para a satisfação do cliente e excelência do produto.
